LanguageData.HarvestedBlood_Bloodlust.stages.bloodlus: Extracting their blood and seeing them grow weaker under my hands was such a thrill.
LanguageData.DonatedBlood.stages.donated_blood.label: donated blood
LanguageData.DonatedBlood.stages.donated_blood.descri: My blood donation will save lives and help those in need. I made a difference today.
